title: my Ranked score
body:
I Tried to play 2 Ranked games one today (Jan. 12th) and one yesterday (11th) both times I got no support in full screen mode and I tried the suggestion of pressing alt+enter like it said but it didn't work and I tried turning off my computer and tried again same thing.

I do not want to take 2 loses just because the client isn't working properly, please get back to me with a solution.

Thanks,

TheWhiteJelly

replies.body:
Is this happening after the game starts?  If I understand correctly, you're receiving a blank screen that says "No support" during the match?

What happens if you try another workaround:

Log in to League of Legends
Browse to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and open "Game.cfg" in notepad or any other text editor
Find this line: WindowMode=X
Change the "X" to 2. IE: WindowMode=2
Save this, then launch a custom game

Make sure to test this in a custom game to avoid any penalties.  Let me know!
I'll give it a try, is there anything that can be done about the 2 losses I took?
